question: The 8th session of the Governing Body of International Treaty of Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (ITPGRFA) is being organized in which country?
explanation:
The eight-session of the Governing Body of International Treaty of Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (ITPGRFA) is being held in Rome, Italy from 11-16 November 2019. The Governing Body sessions are biennial.

ITPGRFA is also known as the International Seed Treaty. It aims to guarantee food security through exchange, conservation, and sustainable use of the world\'s plant genetic resources for food and agriculture (PGRFA). The treaty was signed in the year 2001 with effect from 2004. The first session of the governing body was held in Madrid in June 2006.
